snippet: Modeled on benefits like the Live Aid in 1985 and Live 8 in 2005, the concert was intended to be accessible to two billion people.
abstract: Madison Square Garden plays host to 12-12-12 concert to benefit the victims of Hurricane Sandy, with performances by Bruce Springsteen, Billy Joel, Bon Jovi, Paul McCartney and many others; concert, modeled on benefits like the Live Aid in 1985 and Live 8 in 2005, was intended to be accessible to two billion people.

byline.contributor: Angela Macropoulos and Randy Leonard contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Modeled on benefits like the Live Aid in 1985 and Live 8 in 2005, the concert was intended to be accessible to two billion people.

headline.seo: At 12-12-12 Benefit Concert, Stars Offer Tribute to Storm-Torn Areas
headline.main: An All-Star Concert in Reply to a Storm
headline.print_headline: An All-Star Concert in Reply to a Storm
